dn13:15.1: te vata, vāseṭṭha → teva vāseṭṭha (ka-ma), etthantare pāṭho syā1-3 potthakesu
dn13:30.5: pariyonaddhā → te (s1-3, mr), onaddhā → ophuṭā (bj, mr) | ophutā (s1-3, pts1)
dn13:36.2: āsīditvā → ādisitvā (mr), visāraṃ → visādaṃ (bj, pts1) | visattaṃ (s1-3), sukkhataraṃ → sukkhataraṇaṃ (bj, mr) | sukhataraṃ (s1-3)
